name: Frank HEDDINGS and Sandra Heddings v. John STEELE and Edith Steele and Mack Gatz. Appeal of John STEELE and Edith Steele

parties: Frank HEDDINGS and Sandra Heddings v. John STEELE and Edith Steele and Mack Gatz. Appeal of John STEELE and Edith Steele.

opinions.text: Petitions for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, Nos. 7 and 8 M.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

505 A.2d 252
Frank HEDDINGS and Sandra Heddings v. John STEELE and Edith Steele and Mack Gatz. Appeal of John STEELE and Edith Steele.
